content: Automatically I'm let down. The legend for sectional maps are fuzzy and when I zoom in it loses clarity. Not very good for an app. You're going to set up an app it needs to be able to be clearly read.
Great app. Scored 90 on written
The practice test asks questions but the only option to answer is see explanation and there isn't any! Flash cards are üëç

Can you guys add a random study session? So is not a test practice, but is it has combination of samples (the problem with practice test is that it doesnt give you the answer right that moment like study session does) (the problem with study session is that some of the question of a session i already know by heart so there is no need in doing that one again in order to get to the ones i dont know) or can you keep track of the ones i struggle with and review does more. Be able to saves those alon
Helped me get an 83% on the ppl written. I can confirm that almost every question I saw on the exam was in this app. Way more convinient than a paper test prep book

Great app. It was so helpful to be able to study questions whenever a had free time, wherever I was. Only complaint is the same as one other review I read. It would be very helpful if there was a virtual plotter feature somehow. Maybe like Google earth uses a two finger touch on maps to measure between two points. Other that that, I don't know that I would've passed my written without it!
Couldn't ask for better
Got a 90% using this app

Please fix how this app does the test.. I like doing the study mode, and doing all questions, well after a few hundred or so I like to save where I'm at, take a break, and sometimes it won't let me pick up where I left off! It only lets me review the questions. This is very aggravating. Have it were you can review or you can continue.

The app is great however, a virtual plotter would be helpful to determine distances and direction. I can't pull out a plotter that I happen to carry with me to get an accurate measurement. If not able to add a virtual plotter, make the locations closer together. Zooming can only go so far.

I used this app for a whole semester, then didn't use it for about 2 months. I tried to study after that time period and the app wasn't working. I clicked on all the options; like, flashcard mode, learning mode, test mode, etc., and it didn't give me the categories I could choose from before. It was just blank. I've tried to download it again two times now and restart my phone, but nothing is working.
replyContent: Hi Summer, please contact us directly at android@sportys.com and we'll get this issue resolved for you asap. Thanks!

content: Learning history needs to display category name(s) in the list. Learning mode selection prompt should display if you have previously taken the category of questions or even better, how many times taken. End of session prompt should be done on pressing next button of last question because you want to read all answer comments after final selection. Otherwise, good app so far...
tks

Great app. Focus on FAA exam questions with the answers and the explanations. With the update now, it's has links to FAA books where you can find the answers. you can buy a lot of flying books to learn and add to your knowledge, but this app help you to focus on the questions for FAA exam. keep practicing on this app, definitely you liked as me. Recommended for all student pilots to study, and for professional pilots to review. thank you for this app, keep up with the good work.

Love the update! Thank you for adding the ability to save progress! Only request would be to auto save when navigating to the next / previous question so that progress is not lost should the app be closed without hitting the back button.
this app has been great, until i udated now it no longer works.
helped me out a lot!
excellent study aid for the knowledge test. I completed the Gold Seal online ground school, then used this app for a week prior to my exam. Scored a 90% and am more then happy with this app.
Why? I just bought this app and a week later they drastically changed the layout. It's less usable than before. Figures are cut off on the sides.
replyContent: Hi Jeff, this is the first of a series of updates we have planned for our Study Buddy apps to allow us to add new features and better keep the app up to date with the latest FAA questions. Can you email us at support@sportys.com with what type of device and Android OS you're using to help us troubleshoot the figure display issue? Thank you.

content: Bought this app and was charged double for it ($20). Emailed and requested a refund for the overcharge, NO response from anyone. Not paying double for something I only got one of.
replyContent: Hi Wendy, Google should be able take care of any billing issues related to Google Play app purchases for Android devices. If they still have not resolved this issue, email us at support@sportys.com and we'll get it taken care of for you.

content: After being told by countless people to download the App I finally did. Before, I was using Mywrittenexam and was barely passing. With Study Buddy, you have flashcards, questions and a test. For the study material it explains why all answer are wrong and why they are correct. It even gives you the equations as well. You can't save it but a long as you don't close the app you can pick up right where you left off. My average practice test scores were between 80 83. I took my Written today and Passed with an 85%

This app is exactly what I want... Except that it doesn't save progress. I 
want to read through a couple questions at a time a few times a day so I 
can retain what I've already learned. But it's fairly useless if it starts 
over every time I have to leave the app. Honestly seems like a substantial 
con for a $10 application...

Really is a useful app. Has a 714 question bank with explainations for all 
of them. Just wish I could pick up where I left or review questions I've 
marked for further review. At the end of the day it's still an app.

Got a 97% on the private pilot wriiten on my first take. This app is a great analog for the actual test. I wish it could be paused in test mode. It DOES save your progress in learning mode if you dont close the app. Note: charts are not to scale and cant be measured with plotter, but the same is true of the actual charts you will use in the test supplement.

Sure wish I could pick back up where I left off on my study sessions.  Over 700 questions on the ppl study and must restart every time the app is reopened.  Also keeping a database of my progress would be great.
Well done.  It would be nice if the explanations were a bit better worded,  it's sometimes ambiguous what the correct answer was.
This app helped me prepare for my written exam with it's updated information
Worth every penny! Made PPL written exam a breeze.
Would it be possible to pick up where you left off when you reopen the app? If I'm working through 700 questions, it didn't help to start over each time I open the app.
Learning mode is just test mode, why do I have to click show explanation? It should only show the correct answer for LEARNING
Great app but the latest update has made it feel sluggish on the Nexus 7.
I bought both this one and the gleim one, gleim offers more but is way more expensive.

Where to begin? Random scrolling of graphics while trying to study them. References to mysterious "table below". This app also was very badly edited.  Grammatical and typo errors create confusing messages in explanations, which are nothing more than cursory reiterations of the answers. You learn nothing but answers. Won't understand them. No explanation for why something is so. Very upset with purchase.
Ehh still learning
Covers a good bank of questions in a better mobile interface than some of the free web pages. With the new update everything looks great and they fixed my two complaints.
Great prep tool! Would be nice to see better explantions but all in all great buy. Passed the written using Study Buddy.

The app has a decent amount of content, not what would seem like $10 worth.   As far as the interface, I couldn't save or star the questions I wanted to look at later if I wanted to study a different section. You can save them for later as long add you stay in the same section. Also, there is an error where the app doesn't clear the display area while going back through questions you already answered. Not a big deal, but considering the paid app, I expect better.
Really great app!
Excellent
A pretty complete study guide and question back for FAA exam. Learning mode with explanations is great for test prep and convenient for miscellaneous study time.

Great way to study on-the-go but the app could use some work. Starred questions should not disappear after ending the study session, the ten dollar fee should include premium access to their online study buddy, there should be a moveable mini "plotter" cause you can't do flight planning questions without it, and there lastly should be a way to permanently mark problem questions for later review.
Amazing!!! I can study anywhere!!!
This app rocks!

just plain waste of money, same questions over and over. look at electrical, two questions, both the same? whats up with that? pretty easy toget 100% on that segment.... sorry I wasted 10$ on this....... turns me off of Sporty's in general, why would they offer something this sorry? reflects poorly on all their products.....
Study Buddy

It would be nice to be able to mark questions that we routinely miss with the star, then be able to go back and do a test of all the marked questions. Right now when you mark a question in a study session, as soon as you end the session the marker disappears. No good..
A lot of the explanations are just like "the answer is B", which says nothing about why B is correct. I would recommend the ASA test prep book instead.
The developers at sportys did a great job on this app. I passed my written no problem
Good prep but hard to read charts and graphs
No updates to the questions. I've had this software for almost 2 months now and I see no updates to the questions or anything. Got some questions on my exam that are not here.
Easy way to study for the FAA written.
Good product, unhelpful staff
Questions don't match charts in study mode. Flash cards won't flip. Not quite useless but close. Steve - LG G2X
Purchased it and won't download
Great App, just need to be able to keep your place so you can start up at the same point you left off at instead of starting over.
Downloaded fine on wifi connection. Good app.
I can't download it...it just says your purchase will be downloaded and does not do anything
Excellent software ,using it daily to prepare myself for the exam! Thank you so much Sami - florida
A great on the go study tool.
